title: Time-Life 'Mysteries of the Unknown' — body type?
content:
Hello

We would love to know what body font is used on this very popular series of books published in the late 80s by Time-Life [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mysteries\_of\_the\_Unknown](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802224128/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mysteries_of_the_Unknown "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mysteries\_of\_the\_Unknown")

As ever, many thanks for your time and expertise!

M

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802224128im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MotU_IMG_0162_5610.gif)
author: mvor

comments.content: Great spot, many thanks! I am finding I appreciate the Usherwood typefaces more and more...
